attributes.action: make it law that school buses for all ages have fitted seatbelts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It currently isn't law to have seatbelts on school buses, both free and paid for dedicated school buses.

Not only is there a very serious safety issue here, it allows schools to condone children sitting three to a seat, even at secondary school age.

On a daily basis our children are suffering discomfort on a daily basis, more importantly their lives are quite possibly being endangered by the lack of law in this area.
